fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Base UI > Window (Standalone) > Traditional Modal

Actual Result:
No Navbar for the user to return to the application

Expected Result:
To display a navbar for the user to return to the application

Note:
Last working in 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: Navbar is missing in Traditional Modal window, user cannot go back to the application
fields.environment: iPhone 4.3.2 with INFO Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (04/26/11 11:54 6b80fd9...)

comments.body: Does not occur on iPhone 3GS iOS 3.1.2, iPad (3.2.2), iPod 3rd gen (4.0.2), iPod 4th gen (4.1) or iPhone 4 VZW (4.2.6)
